articleContent:
Dear Rover,
To bring you exciting new content and a better gaming experience, we will soon be conducting the update maintenance for Version 1.4: When the Night Knocks.
During the maintenance, you will be unable to log in to the game, so please plan your time accordingly. Additionally, due to the large size of the update, we recommend updating the game while connected to a Wi-Fi network. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

[Maintenance Time & Compensation Details]
✦ Maintenance Time: 2024-11-14 04:00 to 2024-11-14 11:00 (UTC+8)
✦ Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2
✦ Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2024-11-14 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.
※ In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.

[How to Update]
Once the maintenance for the version update begins, you can follow the following instructions to update your client.
✦ Android: Launch the game and follow the instructions in the update pop-up window to complete the update.
✦ iOS: Update the game in the App Store.
✦ PC: Close the game, restart the launcher, and then click on "Update."

[Pre-download on PC]
✦ Starting Time: 2024-11-12 09:30 (UTC+8)
※ With the pre-download feature enabled, "New Version Pre-download" appears below the "Start" button on the PC launcher interface. Select this option to pre-download the material for the latest version. You can continue playing the game while the pre-downloading process is ongoing. You can pause the process at any time, and whether it is complete or not, the update maintenance will speed up to a certain degree when initiated.
※ The pre-download material is approximately 30GB in size. To ensure that the subsequent processes of file decompressing and app installation will go smoothly, it is recommended that your PC has at least 60GB of unused storage space.

[Version 1.4 Preview]
✦ New Resonators: 5-Star Resonator – Camellya, 4-Star Resonator – Lumi
✦ New Weapons: 5-Star Weapon – Red Spring, 4-Star Weapon - Somnoire Anchor
✦ New Events: Somnium Labyrinth - Somnoire Adventure Event, Depths of Illusive Realm - Phantasm Amass, Pincer Maneuver Warriors - Recurring Combat Event, Beyond the Waves - Featured Exploration Event, Tactical Simulacra II - Featured Combat Event, Ragunna Sales Blitz! - Pioneer Association Event
✦ New Story: Camellya's Companion Story - Forking Paths Among the Stars
✦ Other New Content: New Feature - Weapon Projection, Phantom Appearance - Phantom: Inferno Rider
※ 5-Star Resonator Camellya can be obtained through the [End of Lost Trail] Featured Resonator Convene. 4-Star Resonator Lumi can be obtained through the [When Thunder Pours] Featured Resonator Convene and the [Celestial Revelation] Featured Resonator Convene. After the event ends, starting from the next version, 4-Star Resonator Lumi will be permanently available in Featured Weapon & Resonator Convene and Standard Weapon & Resonator Convene.
※ For more details on the new content, optimizations, and bug fixes coming to the game in Version 1.4: When the Night Knocks, please stay tuned for the upcoming release notes.

[Device Requirements]
To ensure a smooth experience, please refer to the following requirements:
① Minimum
Android: [System] Android 7.0 or later; [Processor] Snapdragon 835, MediaTek G71/72 or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 4 GB or more
iOS: [System] iOS 14 or later; [Model] iPhone 11 or newer, iPad with A13 Bionic or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 4 GB or more
PC: [System] Windows 10 64-bit; [CPU] Intel I5 (9th Gen)/Ryzen 2700; [GPU] Geforce 1060/RX570/Intel ARC A380, [RAM] 16 GB or more
② Recommended
Android: [System] Android 7.0 or later; [Processor] Snapdragon Gen1+/Gen2/Gen3 or MediaTek processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 6 GB or more
iOS: [System] iOS 15 or later; [Model] iPhone 13 or newer, iPad with A15 Bionic or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 6 GB or more
PC: [System] Windows 10 64-bit; [CPU] Intel I7 (9th Gen)/Ryzen 3700, [GPU] Geforce 2060/RX5700XT/Intel ARC A750; [RAM] 16 GB or more
③ Required Storage Space
Android/iOS: 16 GB
PC: 30 GB; it's recommended to install the game on an SSD.
④ Controller Support
Wuthering Waves currently supports the following controllers on Mobile.
Wireless Controllers: Xbox series, Xbox Elite series, DualShock®4, DualSense®, DualSense Edge™
Wuthering Waves currently supports the following controllers on PC.
Wired/Wireless Controllers: Xbox series, Xbox Elite series
Wireless Controllers: DualSense®, DualSense Edge™ 
Wired Controllers: DualShock®4
articleTitle: Wuthering Waves Version 1.4 Update Maintenance Notice
